name: CoQA
summary: Conversational Question Answering challenge with 127k questions across 8k dialogues spanning multiple domains​:contentReference[oaicite:29]{index=29}. Each question is answered in free-form text (often a short phrase) along with an evidence span from the passage as rationale.
size: 8,000 conversations, 127,000+ Q&A pairs​:contentReference[oaicite:30]{index=30}. (Train ~108k Q, Dev 7.2k Q, Test ~7.3k Q).
download: Stanford CS224N GitHub (coqa-train-v1.0.json, coqa-dev-v1.0.json) or HuggingFace `coqa`.
notes: Domains include children’s stories, literature, middle/high school textbooks, etc. Answers can be yes/no or free text, not necessarily extractive. A highlighted evidence text is provided for each answer. CoQA evaluates F1 of answer text and a conversational Exact Match.
